Carrousel with Outside Buttons 

Use of custom buttons to allow placement of navigation controls anywhere on the page.

Full Width Hero

For increased visual interest in header of portals or sites. 
Note that static content cannot sit in front of the Carousel component, so it's not possible to put a navigation masthead or thumbnail strip in front of the component.

News Headline Slider
Simple example with a big image and a headline.

Custom Buttons
Effective use of custom navigation buttons for positioning within the carousel.

Next / Previous Preview
This method uses 3 carousels,  bound to the same set of custom buttons. 
Use formula fields on model to retrieve data necessary for construction of next and previous image URL.

Multiple Panes
This method uses 4 carousels,  bound to the same set of custom navigation buttons. 
Slide background is used to show image,  while wrapper height helps maintain a consistent sizing.
